post.title: When you should think about using our service
post.body:
If you are among the following or considering doing the following in China, we highly recommend you consider using our service:
- you are a high ranked business executive working in China
- you are a high net worth individual doing business in China
- you plan to come to China to live and work, but do not have living and working experience in China before
- you plan to marry a Chinese
- you plan to move to and work in a small city in China
- you are about to enter an employment agreement or a business contract with a Chinese business
- you want to source products from Chinese vendors

post.title: Who we are and what we can do for you
post.body:
We are a group of individuals who grew up in China, educated overseas, and have extensive business development and running experience. We are widely connected both in China and overseas. We understand both local Chinese culture and western culture. Cheating, forging, swindling, or harmful designs may be rampant in some parts of the world, but with our service you can expect those bad things be minimized or avoided. We provide the following service:

- negotiation for any of your local personal and business deals, including renting, employment, local medicare, and shopping
- personal investigation and intelligence
- product sourcing

post.body:
